cab.content: [Repeated to Bagdad and Tehran.) (Received 4th December, 5 p.ni.)Persia. It is suggested that valuable effect might bo obtained in Persia if Uleiuas Najaf and Kerbela could be induced to send letters for publication to ,chie.I: Mull as in Persia telling of generous and sympathetic treatment bv British Government, and urging them to support" British cause in Persia and British efforts to assist Persian Government to maintain order in Southern Persia. Do you approve ?
